summary: This is an email chain from September 10, 2019, where attorney Gloria Allred forwards a potential victim's statement to an FBI contact and proposes an interview. The email discusses scheduling a meeting with a victim (referred to as Jane Doe) in New York on September 12, 2019.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Attorney representing a victim, who is proposing an interview between the victim and the FBI. She attaches the victim's statement and coordinates the meeting.

persons.name: Jane Doe
persons.context: A victim represented by Gloria Allred, who is willing to speak to the FBI. Her statement was read in court and is attached to the email.

connections.description: Gloria Allred is the attorney representing the victim Jane Doe, as evidenced by her forwarding the victim's statement and scheduling an interview on her behalf.

events.title: Proposed FBI interview with victim
events.description: Gloria Allred proposes a meeting between the FBI and a victim (Jane Doe) at the Lotte hotel in New York at 5:00 PM, followed by a separate meeting.

locations: Los Angeles, CA 90048 (Allred, Maroko & Goldberg office address)
keyFacts: Attorney Gloria Allred is facilitating an interview between the FBI and a victim (Jane Doe) in September 2019.
The victim's statement was previously read in court, indicating prior legal proceedings related to the case.
The proposed interview was scheduled for September 12, 2019, at 5:00 PM at the Lotte hotel in New York.
The email highlights ongoing FBI investigation activities regarding Epstein-related victims in 2019.
The correspondence is marked as confidential and contains legally privileged information.
